value.title: Ford Taps Non-IT Professionals to Broaden Its AI Expertise
value.excerpt: The auto maker has trained more than 1,000 employees on a platform it developed to put AI tools in the hands of people across the company.

value.title: The Challenge of Being Human in the Age of AI
value.excerpt: Reason is our primary means of understanding the world. How does that change if machines think?

value.title: Untether AI Touts “At-Memory” Architecture, Promising Efficiency And Performance At The Edge
value.excerpt: Untether AI recently emerged from stealth and described their architecture as being “At-Memory”, which the company claims will deliver leading performance and power efficiency. Most products that claim the latter deliver relatively weak performance (with the exception of Qualcomm’s CloudAI 100).

value.title: AI-powered camera surveys scenes to auto capture memorable moments
value.excerpt: Canon turned to the Japanese crowd to fund development and production of an AI-powered photo/video camera that automatically captures scenes unfolding in front of it. Now the company has launched the device in Europe as the PowerShot PX.

value.title: Machine learning deployment platform OctoML raises $85M
value.excerpt: OctoML, which helps companies deploy their machine models into production, has raised $85 million in a series C round of funding.

value.title: Sapiens Author Warns That Human Brains Could Be Hacked if AI Is Not Regulated
value.excerpt: World-renowned science author Yuval Noah Harari said that someday human brains could be hacked into if emerging AI systems are not properly regulated.

value.title: Top 10 robotics stories of October
value.excerpt: DeepMind acquiring MuJoCo and Waymo's self-driving cars getting stuck on a dead-end street in SF captured your attention in October 2021.

value.title: Why Should Humankind Strive To Build Artificial General Intelligence?

value.title: How Leaders In Security, Observability And Innovation Master Cloud Complexity
value.excerpt: As organizations adopt microservices architectures, multiple public clouds and more, complexity will only increase.

value.title: Meta’s Andrew Bosworth on moving Facebook to the metaverse
value.excerpt: Facebook announced a major corporate rebrand by changing its company name to Meta. As CEO Mark Zuckerberg told The Verge, the new name is meant to solidify the social media giant’s long-term bet on building the metaverse.

value.title: Using conversational AI to support employees’ psychological needs
value.excerpt: Healthcare workers put on a brave face each day to serve those who are suffering, and in doing so they often put aside their personal self-care. value.title: Humans may get to talk to whales, courtesy artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: With the goal of 'talking' to the majestic marine animals, a project to listen to, contextualise and translate the communication of Sperm whales was recently launched by a team of international scientists.

value.title: Three Ways A Causal Approach Can Improve Trust In AI
value.excerpt: If they win the trust of their workforce and customers, organizations will be well on the road to successfully adopting AI and automation — and delivering the business transformation they’ve aspired to.

value.title: How to build scalable AI in 3 steps: Lessons from Capital One's ML team

value.excerpt: IBM, Microsoft, Amazon Web Services, Oracle, SAP, Intel, NVIDIA, Google, Sentient Technologies, Salesforce, ViSenze Recently added report provided by QY Reports Machine Learning in Retail Market Presents an Analysis of Market Situation and Challenges.

value.title: Intel Habana AI Accelerator Becomes Available On Amazon EC2
value.excerpt: The Amazon EC2 DL1 instance type delivers up to 8 Gaudi accelerators with 32 GB of high bandwidth memory (HBM) per accelerator with 400 Gbps of networking throughput and 4 TB of local NVMe storage.

value.title: ARV hosts AI & Robotics Hackathon 2021: Open House

value.title: DeepMind takes next step in robotics research
value.excerpt: MuJoCo's free availability will have a positive impact on the work of scientists who are struggling with the costs of robotics research.

value.title: UMass Lowell, partners to launch AI-robotics initiative to aid older adults

value.title: Advancing AI Revenue Growth Insights In The Transportation And Logistics Industry Series: Blog #5
value.excerpt: This is the fifth blog in the Advancing AI in the Transportation Industry, focused on drones and references innovations by Amazon.

value.title: Tech Time: Delta Air Lines launches new facial recognition software
value.excerpt: To streamline the check-in process at the airport, Delta Air Lines is introducing new facial recognition technology to airport security.

value.title: Intuit Accelerator Combines Fintech For Good With AI
value.excerpt: Fintech for good startup Bankuish is one of seven early-stage companies in the Intuit Prosperity Accelerator: AI. The five-month program is for fledgling fintech companies that target consumers and small businesses in North America and want to use AI to build better platforms.

value.title: AI is now learning to evolve like earthly lifeforms
value.excerpt: Deep Evolutionary Reinforcement Learning creates virtual agents that can evolve both in their physical structure and learning capacities.
